Dear Customer,
Honeywell has recently upgraded your APU diagnostic suite (PTMD <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/predictive-trend-monitoring-and-diagnostics]]>) to Honeywell Forge. You are eligible for a Free Trial for Connected Maintenance, the complete predictive analytics suite included in Honeywell Forge.
More than 100 airlines have been using Honeywell’s Predictive Trend Monitoring and Diagnostics application (PTMD) to reduce maintenance costs and improve the process of troubleshooting Honeywell auxiliary power units (APU). You can now enjoy more predictive and prescriptive analytics for more than a dozen ATA chapters. Request a free trial of our Connected Maintenance!
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/ecs-performance-check?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_atr&utm_content=ecs]]> PTMD Upgrade FAQ What is PTMD and who is using it?
The PTMD application provides web-based fleet and maintenance management with a focus on Honeywell auxiliary power units (APU) availability. Monitoring APU conditions, it enables scheduled removals and thus minimizes time on the ground (AOG) as well as delays and cancelations (D&C). The system covers numerous APU types for both Airbus and Boeing aircrafts. The tool provides health information and assistance for fleet management. Honeywell has rich experience with dozens of airlines and thousands of APUs enrolled.
Why upgrade now?
PTMD is now part of Honeywell Forge Connected Maintenance. Apart from the new interface upgrade, airlines can be transferred to the Honeywell Forge platform. This increases security and data storage capabilities improving user experience. PTMD APU The main value for users comes from the powerful capabilities of Connected Maintenance. While PTDM has a strong focus on APU, Connected Maintenance provider powerful analytics for more than a dozen ATA chapters. This is a limited-time offer for existing customers only!
What’s the value to airlines?
Upgrading to Connected Maintenance unlocks many benefits beyond APU diagnostics:
- Alerts of APU issues before they lead to an AOG - Reduction in APU MELs and inop events - Proactive maintenance through actionable recommendations - Cost reduction - Increase of availability - Better plannability - Safer operations - Increased passenger comfort
What is the Free Trial?
The Free Trial is available to all Honeywell Forge customers. The data integration projects will be prioritized on a first-come, first-served basis. If your airline is not a Honeywell Forge customer, please reply or click below to explore the options when it comes to ingesting ACMS and flight data. Want more info?
Simply reply to this email and we'll get right back to you!
